answers.answer: I started at 151 last appointment I was 175 I'm 37 weeks. If I could not gain anymore that would be great lol
Girl ive gained over 55 pounds. If yours and baby's heartrate are ok, good blood pressure, no diabetes, you're ok! Not everyone can fit into that ideal weight range the doctors expect.
I'll be 36 weeks tomorrow and I've gained 20 so far
It's crazy because when people look at me, they say I'm all baby which is what it looks like to me also so idk where all the weight is coming from haha
Im 30 weeks started at 135 now 170, im worried bout my weight to but hey ot will all be worth it i just plan to walk & exersise as much as i can after my baby is here
Started at 137 and im 36 weeks and 162. But I look little still you will be fine sweetie
Me too.  Nothing really drastic after he comes. Just water as the only beverage and tons of walking around. Thanks ladies!
I started at 135, gave birth weighing 204. Within a week I was down to 145
Ahh, that's great. You didn't do anything special?
Oh god no. I sat on my *** pretty much all day. I breastfeed. And apparently that helps you lose the weight a lot faster
Lol that's still good. I'm not breastfeeding though so I guess I'll just wait to see what happens for me

I was 145 pounds before I was pregnant and my first check up I was at 19 weeks and I weighed 158 pounds that day and when I went back around 25 weeks I weighed 168 pounds and my last appointment two weeks ago I was around 28 weeks and I weighed 180 pounds and I'm 30 weeks today so I probably gained more lol. It's normal to gain weight. Your carrying a child inside you and eating for 2 or depending if your have more then 1 bun in the oven
Don't forget on average 10-15 pounds is all baby, placenta and fluid retention xx

As long as your doctor isn't concerned, don't worry about it! Just be sure you are getting the proper nutrition for you and your baby, and leave the worrying about baby weight for later. A lot of that weight will disappear once your little one is here. :)

question: 38 pound weight gain so far. Started at 140 and now I'm 178:( Anybody gained about that much? I'm worried about getting it all back off after my son comes
title: 36 weeks and 38 pounds:(
